Text.val: 29.10.2013 JH SCR18469 Added parameter pi.DEBC_INCASSOTYPE in call of BID018
17.04.2009 GB SCR14554 Changed condition for selection
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Olympia invoices with fixed due days')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/INVO INVO, :1/DEBC DEBC, :1/CLNT CLNT where DEBC.DEBC_NO = INVO.INVO_DEBC_NO and INVO.INVO_ADMNO = CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and INVO.INVO_CLNTNO = CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO.INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and DEBC.DEBC_NETDAYS > 0 and INVO.INVO_SCHT_NO > 0 and (INVO.INVO_NETDAYS <> DEBC.DEBC_NETDAYS or INVO.INVO_VALUEDAYS <> DEBC.DEBC_VALUEDAYS or INVO.INVO_EOM <> DEBC.DEBC_PAYTERMEOM or INVO.INVO_EXTRADAYS <> DEBC.DEBC_PAYTERMEXTRADAYSEOM or INVO.INVO_TRANSFERDAY <> DEBC.DEBC_PAYTERMTRANSFERDAYS) for fetch only

select INVO.INVO_NO, INVO.INVO_ADMNO, INVO.INVO_CLNTNO, INVO.INVO_DEBC_DEBC, INVO.INVO_INVOICENO, INVO.INVO_INVDATE, INVO.INVO_NETDAYS, INVO.INVO_VALUEDATE, DEBC.DEBC_NETDAYS, DEBC.DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTPOSSIBLE, DEBC.DEBC_INCASSOTYPE, DEBC.DEBC_INCASSOCONDITION, DEBC.DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTIONDAYS, INVO.INVO_AUTOMATICINCASSO, DEBC_MAXFINTIMEAFTERDUEDATE, DEBC_CREDITLIMIT, DEBC.DEBC_VALUEDAYS, DEBC.DEBC_PAYTERMEOM, DEBC.DEBC_PAYTERMEXTRADAYSEOM, DEBC.DEBC_PAYTERMTRANSFERDAYS, DEBC.DEBC_MAXFINTIMEAFTERINVDATE from :1/INVO INVO, :1/DEBC DEBC, :1/CLNT CLNT where DEBC.DEBC_NO = INVO.INVO_DEBC_NO and INVO.INVO_ADMNO = CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and INVO.INVO_CLNTNO = CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO.INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and DEBC.DEBC_NETDAYS > 0 and INVO.INVO_SCHT_NO > 0 and (INVO.INVO_NETDAYS <> DEBC.DEBC_NETDAYS or INVO.INVO_VALUEDAYS <> DEBC.DEBC_VALUEDAYS or INVO.INVO_EOM <> DEBC.DEBC_PAYTERMEOM or INVO.INVO_EXTRADAYS <> DEBC.DEBC_PAYTERMEXTRADAYSEOM or INVO.INVO_TRANSFERDAY <> DEBC.DEBC_PAYTERMTRANSFERDAYS) for fetch only
